<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Maker of Miracles](/Feats.aspx?ID=309) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 127 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[miraculous spell](/Classes.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

You are a conduit for truly deific power. You gain an additional 10th-level spell slot.
name: Maker of Miracles
